Description
AIBot
 
Card
The Card class within the UNO game which represents a card in the UNO game.
Colour
The Colour enumerate Contains all the Colors the card can be
Deck
Light side: 18 Blue - 1-9 18 Green - 1-9 18 Red - 1-9 18 Yellow - 1-9 8 Draw One - 2 each colour 8 Reverse - 2 each colour 8 Skip - 2 each colour 8 Flip - 2 each colour 4 Wild 4 Wild Draw 2 Dark side: 18 Pink - 1-9 18 Teal - 1-9 18 Orange - 1-9 18 Purple - 1-9 8 Draw Five - 2 each colour 8 Reverse - 2 each colour 8 Skip Everyone - 2 each colour 8 Flip - 2 each colour 4 Wild 4 Wild Draw Colour
DrawCardListener
DrawCardListener is the ActionListener for Draw Card button
DrawCardView
DrawCaardView the general JFrame of the UNO game holding the inner view components
FirstValidAI
This is the FirstValidAI class within the UNO game which represents an AI bot player on the UNO game.
Game
Game allows users to play a game of UNO Flip
Game.Direction
 
GameController
GameController initialize the setup of the UNO game and connects the model and the view for and interactive experience through a GUI
GameView
Gameview the general JFrame of the UNO game holding the inner view components
HandListener
HandListener is the ActionListener for all cards in players hand
HandView
HandView the view holding the players cards within their hand for game of UNO Flip
HighestValueAI
This is the HighestValueAI class within the UNO game which represents an AI bot player on the UNO game.
Human
Real human player of the game of UNO Flip.
LowestValueAI
This is the LowestValueAI class within the UNO game which represents an AI bot player on the UNO game.
NextPlayerListener
NextPlayerListener is the ActionListener for the Next Player button
Player
This is the Player class within the UNO game which represents a player on the UNO game.
Side
The Side enumerate Contains all the Side that the card can have
StatusNextView
The status panel for UNO Flip
TopCardView
TopCard View top card for the UNO Flip
Value
The Value enumerate Contains all the Values that the card can have
View
Interface for the views of the game, to ensure each view has its own implementation of update
